alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:57AM CDT until July 09 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN OKLAHOMA AND NORTHERN CLEVELAND COUNTIES... At 357 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southeastern Oklahoma City, or near Stanley Draper Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Nicoma Park, Valley Brook, Stella, Tinker Air Force Base, Stanley Draper Lake, Newalla, northwestern Lake Thunderbird, Forest Park, and Smith Village. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
